SEARCH
Package io.avery.conveyor

Interface Belt.StepSinkOperator<In,Out>

Type Parameters:
In - the upstream element type
Out - the downstream element type
All Superinterfaces:
Belt.SinkToStepOperator<In,Out>
Enclosing class:
Belt
Functional Interface:
This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.
@FunctionalInterface public static interface Belt.StepSinkOperator<In,Out> extends Belt.SinkToStepOperator<In,Out>
Represents an operation on a downstream StepSink that produces an upstream StepSink.

Note that methods on this interface are named according to the direction of data flow, not the direction of function application. Methods named "andThen" take an argument that applies downstream of this operator. Methods named "compose" take an argument that applies upstream of this operator.

This is a functional interface whose functional method is andThen(StepSink).

  • Method Details

    • andThen

      Belt.StepSink<In> andThen(Belt.StepSink<? super Out> downstream)
      Connects the downstream sink after this operator. Returns an upstream sink.
      Specified by:
      andThen in interface Belt.SinkToStepOperator<In,Out>
      Parameters:
      downstream - the downstream sink
      Returns:
      the upstream sink
      Implementation Requirements
      The upstream sink is generally expected to internally delegate to the downstream sink in some way. This allows for transforming elements or signals as they travel from upstream to downstream.

    • andThen

      default <T> Belt.StepSinkSource<In,T> andThen(Belt.StepSinkSource<? super Out,? extends T> downstream)
      Connects the downstream segue after this operator. Returns a new segue that pairs the downstream segue's source with the upstream sink obtained by applying this operator to the downstream segue's sink.
      Specified by:
      andThen in interface Belt.SinkToStepOperator<In,Out>
      Type Parameters:
      T - the downstream source element type
      Parameters:
      downstream - the downstream segue
      Returns:
      a new segue with sink transformed
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if downstream is null
